\documentclass[11pt]{book}

\usepackage{pgf}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{pgflibraryplotmarks}

\begin{document}
\date{today}


%% Plot generated by GenPlot of alignapi
\begin{tikzpicture}[cap=round]
